game.name: Cadence
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Solve Problems. Make Music. Feel Nourished. Cadence is a minimalist puzzle game about solving circuits to create music. This is not a rhythm game, but a zen music sandbox that rewards curiosity and problem solving.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Solve Problems. Make Music. Feel Nourished. Cadence is a minimalist puzzle game about solving circuits to create music. This is not a rhythm game, but a zen music sandbox that rewards curiosity and problem solving.
